element.name: Damn Lies by orangetigerprawn, Unknown Cache (3.5/2)

long-description.center: The Central Statistics office is responsible for the collection, compilation, extraction and dissemination for statistical purposes of information relating to economic, social and general activities and conditions in the State. The initial coordinates indicate the location of the CSO office in Swords. In order to find the cache you'll have to work out the final coordinates based on the following puzzle. Buena suerte.

Mary, who was out collecting data for the CSO, knocks on the door of the house. A woman opens the door. Mary asks her how many children he has. The mother tells Mary that she has three children and the product of their ages is 36. That is not enough information for Mary. She asks for more information. The mother says that the sum of their ages equals the number on the house next door. Mary thinks that over. She realizes that is still not enough information; she's fierce clever. So she asks for another clue. The mother says "the eldest is inside playing the piano." Now Mary knows the answer. She writes it down, thanks the mother and heads off on her merry way, thrilled with her mathematical prowess.

A: Age of eldest child
B: Age of second child
C: Age of third child
D: Number of house next door
The cache container is a litre in volume.

element.encoded-hints: I'll well be surprised if you can find this - in a Dublin accent.

ul.li:
2010-04-25T19:00:00Z : Found it by abra123cadabra
It would be a lie to say this was easy. The puzzle was quickly solved and a battle plan for retrieval developed. Almost gave up. Hint makes sense when you're there but doesn't help much. Glad it's done now.

2010-03-12T20:00:00Z : Found it by Fjon
Solved a while ago, but had doubts about parking place. Once I confirmed the right place I got to the cache easy enough. Finding it took a little while, but got it in the end!

2010-02-14T20:00:00Z : Found it by Toffee Man
We had the correct answer to this quiz but had a problem working out the maths & didn't find it last week. After recalculating we went to the correct location today & found the cache after a short search. TFTC Toffee Man #185

2010-02-14T20:00:00Z : Found it by AbbeyAckbar
(#606 @ 13:35)
We tried to find this cache a couple of weeks ago with no joy as we didn't have the right co-ords! We had the right answers to the puzzle, but our maths let us down. Today we came to finish the job. We found the cache not far from were we had been searching the other day. When I (Abbey) found the cache and went to retrieve the container I scratched my hand up on some brambles - owey! [B)] While I cursed my need to find tupperware in the woods [:o)] , Ackbar signed the log and replaced the cache unscathed.
SL. TFTC.

2010-02-14T20:00:00Z : Found it by Blue Jay 59
Found this today - delighted [:D] Nice walk by the river too. TFTC & for the puzzle (I think) [;)] Blue jay 59 #186

wpt.name: GC22W3A
wpt.desc: Damn Lies by orangetigerprawn, Unknown Cache (3.5/2)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Damn Lies
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The Central Statistics office is responsible for the collection, compilation, extraction and dissemination for statistical purposes of information relating to economic, social and general activities and conditions in the State. The initial coordinates indicate the location of the CSO office in Swords. In order to find the cache you'll have to work out the final coordinates based on the following puzzle. Buena suerte.




 


Mary, who was out collecting data for the CSO, knocks on the door of the house. A woman opens the door. Mary asks her how many children he has. The mother tells Mary that she has three children and the product of their ages is 36. That is not enough information for Mary. She asks for more information. The mother says that the sum of their ages equals the number on the house next door. Mary thinks that over. She realizes that is still not enough information; she's fierce clever. So she asks for another clue. The mother says "the eldest is inside playing the piano." Now Mary knows the answer. She writes it down, thanks the mother and heads off on her merry way, thrilled with her mathematical prowess.


Work out the following:


A: Age of eldest child
B: Age of second child
C: Age of third child
D: Number of house next door




 


The Cache


Final Location:


N 53째 D*B+C. (A+B)*D+1


W 006째 D-1.((B+C)*D+C*3+D)*D


The cache container is a litre in volume.


Additional Waypoints
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: I'll well be surprised if you can find this - in a Dublin accent.
